title: Augmented Reality-Based Mobile Science Learning Material Emotional Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and experience with mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Training for Elementary Educators to Acquire Methods for Designing Emotion-Based Science Learning Materials Using AR Technology, Operated Through Individual Device-Based Practical Sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain an emotion design process utilizing 55 emotion keywords (KW) in AR-based mobile learning materials.
Learners can create science content applying five core emotional elements—'Expertise-Motivation', 'Confusion', 'Wandering-Excitement', 'Challenge', and 'Trust'—in augmented reality.
Learners can apply and interpret methods for analyzing learner emotional responses using a Kansei Engineering approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
